Name: Champion Basic Tee Shirt with Seal
Description: Discover the St. Scholastica Champion Basic Tee, crafted for ultimate comfort and versatility. Made from 100% cotton jersey for a soft, breathable feel, with variations including 950's 90% cotton and 10% polyester blend and 990's 50% cotton and 50% polyester mix.

Name: CI Sport Dad Tee
Description: Conquer new heights with the Summit Pro Harness by Gravitator. This lightweight and durable climbing harness features adjustable leg loops and waist belt for a customized fit. With its vibrant blue color, you'll look stylish while maneuvering difficult routes. Safety is a top priority with a reinforced tie-in point and strong webbing loops.

Name: CI Sport Ladies Easy Fit Cardigan - Marble Grey
CI Sport Storm Hood - Navy
Description: 80% cotton, 20% polyester blend for comfort and durability. Cozy 10 oz weight

Name: Freedom Wear Grandparent Everett Tee
Description: A soft, ringspun cotton tee that can be worn on its own or as a layer. The reinforced neck seam keeps the shape wear after wear.

Name: Gear Big Cotton Tumbled Hood - Shield
Description: Fabric: - 80% cotton/20% polyester Features: - Jersey lined hood with drawstring and front pouch pocket - Cotton/spandex rib at cuff and waistband

Name: Jolene Fundamental Short-Grey
Description: These shorts are made with 100% cotton fabric.

Name: League All Day Midi Full Zip - Navy
Description: Add the All Day Midi Full Zip hoodie to your athleisure closet. The straight easy fit, flattering stretchy drape, and uniform forward shoulder allow for comfort and function. Our butter soft lux Micro Terry fabric is made with a perfected blend of materials, using spandex for an amazing 4-way stretch.

Name: League Mens Saranac Vest
Description: Made with the most versatile and sophisticated sweater-knit fleece, this signature style is a quintessential everyday layer in cooler weather.

Name: Legacy Old School Ribbed Cuff Beanie with Pom
Description: This St. Scholastica Saints Legacy Old School Ribbed Cuff Knit Beanie features an embroidered shield on the cuff and knit SAINTS across the middle of the cap. It's finished with a pom on the top.

Name: LogoFit 180's Tec Fleece Ear Warmers with Presidential Shield - Charcoal
Description: Foldable and collapsible for convenient and easy storage.

Name: LogoFit Peak Gloves - Medium
Description: 3M Thinsulate lined gloves from LOGOFIT. Embroidered patch style logo on back of hand

Name: Weatherproof Packable Down Puffer Jacket
Description: 00% 380T high density nylon shell. 90/10 duck down, 550 fill power. Lightweight & packable: folds and stows inside separate pouch. Zippered side entry pockets. Water resistant; Wind resistant. Machine washable. APT Asphalt Melange 75/25 nylon/polyester.
